job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

ML engineer that is interested in a longterm position with SignalPETnbsp This candidate should have a broad experience and knowledge in machinedeep learning and computer visionnbspppnbspppstrongThe strong coding skills in Python using scientific libraries like numpy scipyliliYou have practical experience training deep neural networks with one or more frameworks such as PyTorch Tensorflow or within the teamliliYou can clearly convey your thoughts enjoy presenting what youve done and can cater your message to audiences both technical and nontechnicalliliYou respect and share our company
